description: Training Configuration - Control when and how training happens
notes: auto_train_on_startup: If true, automatically train on app startup
training_data_path: Relative path to training data directory (ddl, documentation, trainingpairs)
load_ddl: Load DDL scripts from ddl/ folder
load_documentation: Load business rules from documentation/ folder
load_training_pairs: Load Q&A examples from trainingpairs/ folder
skip_if_exists: Skip training if data already exists in ChromaDB
To train manually: Use vn.train() in code or call train_from_files() function
To retrain: Set retraining.enabled=true and clear_existing_data=true
